result.html: An bhfuair tú mo theachtaireachtDid you get my message?
result.ponchtml: An ḃfuair tú mo ṫeaċtaireaċtDid you get my message?

result.orig: An féidir leat teachtaireacht a ghlacadh
result.html: An féidir leat teachtaireacht a ghlacadhCan you take a message?
result.ponchtml: An féidir leat teaċtaireaċt a ġlacaḋCan you take a message?

result.ga: Go raibh maith agat as ucht do theachtaireachta
result.orig: Go raibh maith agat as ucht do theachtaireachta
result.html: Go raibh maith agat as ucht do theachtaireachtaThank you for your message.
result.ponchtml: Go raiḃ maiṫ agat as uċt do ṫeaċtaireaċtaThank you for your message.

result.orig: Is féidir na teachtaireachtaí a scrios
result.html: Is féidir na teachtaireachtaí a scriosThe messages can be deleted.
result.ponchtml: Is féidir na teaċtaireaċtaí a scriosThe messages can be deleted.

result.eng: Millions of text messages were sent over Christmas.
result.ga: Seoladh na milliúin teachtaireachtaí téacs ar feadh na Nollag
result.orig: Seoladh na milliúin teachtaireachtaí téacs ar feadh na Nollag
result.html: Seoladh na milliúin teachtaireachtaí téacs ar feadh na NollagMillions of text messages were sent over Christmas.
result.ponchtml: Seolaḋ na milliúin teaċtaireaċtaí téacs ar feaḋ na NollagMillions of text messages were sent over Christmas.

result.eng: Twitter is basically just text messages for the Internet.
result.ga: Níl i Twitter go bunúsach ach teachtaireachtaí téacs don idirlíon
